review: you know what McDonald's is to the restaurant world? this is just like that but fir your phone

like their food, it was good at the beginning.. same with their app. It was good at first to make people get it. Now it is not even funny.. no good offers at all, not even 1 offer that is good, and they dont even try to make it look good... big company that has taken their clients for granted for the last 20 years and dont even deserve money from people. let continue to boycott them like Subway for behing greedy....
